channel.title: privitization – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: The Magna Carta and privitization
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Via Toms Dispatch Tomgram: Noam Chomsky, The Great Charter, Its Fate, and Ours…Posted by Noam Chomsky comes this essay on our long traditions in the battle of the commons and ‘privatization’. It is an interesting read. (hat tip Dale)
item.content:encoded: Via Toms Dispatch Tomgram: Noam Chomsky, The Great Charter, Its Fate, and Ours…Posted by Noam Chomsky comes this essay on our long traditions in the battle of the commons and ‘privatization’.   It is an interesting read.   (hat tip Dale)
